Package org.gvsig.jts

Class Summary
GeometryCracker Cracks the geometries of a topology's layers to force the sharing of coordinates.
GeometrySnapper Moves coordinates of geometries (in a given tolerance) to force them to coincide with coordinates of other geometries in its proximity (the snap tolerance).
JtsUtil Utility methods for JTS library use.
LineStringSelfIntersectionChecker Cheks if a given linestring has selfintersections, and gives methods to split a line with self intersections in many lines.
LineStringSplitter From a given linestring and a set of "cut" points, split the linestring resulting a new linestring between two consecutives (from the start) points.
RepeatedPointTester This class is very close to com.vividsolutions.jts.operation.valid.RepeatedPointTester with one exception.
RobustLengthIndexedLine Implementation of LengthIndexedLine to avoid robustness problems.
RobustLocationIndexedLine  
SnapCoordinateList JTS coordinate list that uses snap to avoid consecutives coordinates at a distance lower than the cluster tolerance.
SnapLineStringSelfIntersectionChecker  
SnappingCoordinateMapWithCounter A coordinate map that consideers snap tolerance and that mantains a counter with the number of ocurrences of each coordinate (and its snapping region) in the map.
SnapRepeatedPointTester RepeatedPointTester implementation that consideers a snap tolerance (points that are at a distance lower than the snap tolerance are consideered the same point)
 

Exception Summary
GeometryCollapsedException
